about_the_game:
In the ultimate contest of wreckage and devastation, Faster Racer Boom! Boom! pits players against each other in various arenas, using their vehicles to destroy their opponents and complete numerous objectives, such as destroying enemy vehicles, protecting allies, capturing enemy flags, or being the last one standing.

FEATURES


  • Improve your Vehicle as you play: Collect scrap and unlock upgrades as your progress through the match
  • A Bunch of Game Modes: Deathmatch, Last Car Standing, Capture the Flag, and More!
  • Garage to customize your vehicle: Choose from different types and colors!
  • Visit Exotic Locals and Wreck each other: Post-Apocalypse landscapes, Modern City scenery, Suburban monotony, and more!

BY THE NUMBERS - What's in the Game currently
  • Vehicles: 8
  • Maps: 4
  • Ammo Types: 6
  • Drops: 3
  • Game Modes: 6

Future Updates

  • New Game Mode - One Flag CTF
  • New Game Mode - Zombie Hunt
  • New Map - Map 6
  • New Map - Map 7
  • New Map - Map 8
  • Expanded - More Cars in the Garage
  • New Feature - More Car Customization Unlocks
  • New Feature - Leader Boards
  • Gameplay Tweaks / Improvements
  • Various Bug Fixes

Patch Updates

Version 20231025
Fixed
- Options button fixed in-game
- Buttons in all in-game menus fixed
- Nitro / Drops resets

Changed
- Drop Sizes rework
- UI Button Layout

Improvements
- Map flow on Plunder Bay
- Drops on Containment Zone

Added
- Mouse Look Option on Pc (Beta)
- 4-Player Split Screen
- Full Controller Support (Xbox and Dual Shock USB)
- Elimination Follow Cam


Version 20230930
Fixed
- Bug that made UI ammo icons 50% regular size
- Fixed bug with Quit button on Pause menu
- Increase Meteor frequency on Containment Zone map
- Replace UI elements to reflect Keyboard buttons
- Fixed Credits button on main menu

Changed
- Moved camera up when selecting larger vehicles
- Removed scrap
- Meteors now just drop a random upgrade plus Armor and Health
- When a player dies they drop 1 of each upgrade they had plus health and armor


Version 20230918
Fixed
- When Selecting the Ambulance in the Garage it would bounce

Changed
- Moved camera up when selecting larger vehicles
- Removed scrap
- Meteors now just drop a random upgrade plus Armor and Health
- When a player dies they drop 1 of each upgrade they had plus health and armor

Improvements
- Fixed random AI behavior
- Reduced scaling on Construction Derby Map

Added
- New Map - Plunder Bay
- Caltrops Drop
- Oil Slick Drop
- Mine Drop
- Additional Car option in Car Garage
- Copyright to credits menu
- Added Early Access to main menu
- Added version number to main menu


Version 20230901
Fixed
- Bug that prevented Containment Zone map from loading

Changed

Improvements
- Fixed random AI behavior

Added
- New Map - Construction Derby
- New Ammo Type - Electrical Rounds
- Additional Car option in Car Garage


Version 20230703
Fixed
- bug that players could spawn On AI Cars
- AI car slow down
- Option menu appearing twice
- Removed Start button from Client lobby
- bug that prevented countdown from appearing on Client
- bug that allowed players to see other player names through buildings
- Bug that player names would not appear in lobby correctly

Changed
- Ammo font shrunk
- Rocket Damage floating point variable
- Added save button to Car Garage
- Double the spread on Shotgun Ammo
- Reduced nitro reload rate (-50%)

Improvements
- Camera at start of match

Added
- Additional Car options in Car Garage


Version 20230819
Fixed
- Various random Bugs

Changed
- Local Menu
- Lobby System

Improvements
- Fixed load times bug on certain hardware configs
- Fixed random AI behavior

Added
- New Map - Containment Zone
- New Mode - Team Deathmatch
- Additional Car option in Car Garage


Version 20230703
Fixed
- bug that players could spawn On AI Cars
- AI car slow down
- Option menu appearing twice
- Removed Start button from Client lobby
- bug that prevented countdown from appearing on Client
- bug that allowed players to see other player names through buildings
- Bug that player names would not appear in lobby correctly

Changed
- Ammo font shrunk
- Rocket Damage floating point variable
- Added save button to Car Garage
- Double the spread on Shotgun Ammo
- Reduced nitro reload rate (-50%)

Improvements
- Fixed LAG spikes on client machines
- Car sound changed to be less annoying
- Allow special characters in Player Names
- Improved screen transition flow
- Added version number

Added
- Additional Car options in Car Garage


Version 20230701
Fixed
- Bug that was prevent AI cars from attacking
- Bug that caused player car to "jiggle" as your accelerated
- Physics on light poles in City Map
- Removed round bottoms on Garbage Can models
- Bug where Client state was not resetting when destroyed

Changed
- Ammo icons on player UI
- Slowed Pistol fire rate
- Pistol now has infinite ammo
- Players drop scrap when destroyed
- Mouse wheel changes weapon ammo type
- Garage Icon on main menu

Improvements
- Made damage numbers easier to read

Added
- Credits button on Main Menu


Version 20230628
Fixed
- Bug that AI cars were respawn inside player cars
- Bug that gun would not lock on to targets
- Bug that UI would not update correctly on second or more games
- Bug that players would not be visible if they died without any kills
- Bug that when spawning some AI cars would only go in reverse
- Bug that prevented the game score from updating correctly

Changed
- Able to use nitro when going backwards
- Changed Rocket ammo damage
- Players no longer gain points for destroying themselves
- Players loss a point when destroying themselves
- Improved ability to click arrows in Main Menu

Improvements
- When entering a game, if a player has the same color car, changes your shade to be darker
- Clients can now see game mode in lobby

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
©2023 THE GUIDANCE DIVISION, INC. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
All trademarks referenced herein are the properties of their respective owners.
detailed_description:
In the ultimate contest of wreckage and devastation, Faster Racer Boom! name: Faster Racer Boom Boom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core 2.6GHz x86-compatible
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 Ti or ATI Radeon™ HD 785
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad core 3.2GHz x64-compatible
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti or ATI Radeon™ RX560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Ultimate contest of wreckage and devastation, Faster Racer Boom! Boom! pits players against each other in various arenas, using their vehicles to destroy their opponents and complete numerous objectives!
